name: Psycho (Markt & Technik)
overview: An adventure game with graphics published in Happy Computer 1985/08, 64'er Sonderheft 66. The game was released in German only, but English language support has unofficially been added to most of the versions in the wild. You have to make the impenetrable walls of Castle Towerhill vanish by magical power. Versions of this game are available for both German and English.
